description.en: The overview of the  Estonian School history from the Middle ages to the present day. The factors which have influenced the educational policy and educational trends in history. The aims of the educational policy, the mechanism of its realization and the impact on the development of society. The analyze and critical interpretation  of  the sources of Estonian School history
description.et: Eesti kooliajaloo kronoloogilis-temaatiline ülevaade keskajast tänapäevani. Erinevate aegade hariduspoliitika ja pedagoogiliste suundumuste mõjutegurid, eesmärgid ja sisu,  elluviimise mehhanismid, tulemused ning mõju ühiskonna arengule. Eesti kooli ajaloo allikate ja uurimuste  analüüs ja kriitiline tõlgendamine

objectives.en: 'To prepare Master`s students of Humanities and Social Subjects (especially teacher of history and civics) for educational activity and active participation in Estonian educational life.
objectives.et: Ette valmistada humanitaar- ja sotsiaalainete (sh eriti ajaloo ja ühiskonnaõpetuse õpetaja) eriala magistriõppe üliõpilasi haridusalaseks tegevuseks ja aktiivseks osalemiseks Eesti hariduselus.

learning_outcomes.en:
1. Competence of finding information of Estonian school history from different sources and literature, ability to analyze this information and to use it so in cultural and educational activity as also in relevant researches.
2. Competence of knowledge of developments, taken part in Estonian educational life and competence of understanding the European context.
3.Competence of assessment the experience of history for today`s educational life.
4. Competence of understanding the role of Intellectuals in building of the  value judgements and attitudes in society.
